messages.content: Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct is a small, fast, and powerful language model from Microsoft that has been integrated into ComfyUI. Its performance is comparable to GPT-3.5 and Mixtral 8x7B.
What are the main features of the Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct model in ComfyUI?

The Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct model in ComfyUI is open-source and commercially available under the MIT license. It performs well in Chinese language tasks and can be used for generating or completing prompts or for open-ended conversations.
What nodes are available for Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI?

The available nodes for Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI include: Phi3mini 4k ModelLoader, which automatically downloads the model; Phi3mini 4k, which supports system instruction setting; and Phi3mini 4k Chat, which supports system instruction setting and multi-turn dialogue.
What are the system requirements for installing Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI?
The system requirements for installing Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI include having the transformers library version 4.40.0 or higher installed.
What is the recommended way to install Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI?

The recommended way to install Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI is by using the ComfyUI Manager (which is currently under development). Alternatively, it can be installed manually by cloning the GitHub repository, installing the required dependencies, and restarting ComfyUI.
What output nodes can be used with Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI?
The output nodes that can be used with Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI include any nodes that accept text input, such as the DisplayText_Zho node from the ComfyUI-Gemini plugin.
What workflows are available for Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI?

The available workflows for Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct in ComfyUI include Phi-3-mini-4k + CosXL and Phi-3-mini-4k Chat, which support single and multi-turn dialogue modes and automatic output of English prompts based on Chinese input.
When was the Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct plugin for ComfyUI first released?

The Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct plugin for ComfyUI was first released on April 26, 2023, with support for system prompts, single/multi-turn dialogue modes, and automatic output of English prompts based on Chinese input.
